content: this candy heart pillow is the perfect statement piece for your home decor the heart pillow is made to look like the classic conversation heart candies that they sell around valentine s day this would also look great in any fun playroom or bedroom make your own using this pattern this pattern uses worsted-weight yarn which is easily found in craft stores this pattern is great for beginners it s worked in row and from the bottom up no sewing is required as you use single_crochet to attach the pieces together
